column1: The Vietnamese noddle soup was absolutely delicious, we'll be back for more!
We had a fantastic meal! Lovely atmostphere too.
This is the best restaurant in town!
Slow service, waiting  was not worth it.
The spring rolls were not at all authentic.
Amazing food in a little restaurant, very cozy and homey.
My girlfriend is Vietnamese and she loved the food here!
They didn't have fork and knife, disappointed!
I was surprised at how good the food was given the affordable price.
